item.title: How to Automate Common Jira Tasks with Go Jira Custom Commands
item.description: in all but small teams I typically recommend separate people for the separate roles [of product managment and project management]. But in every case I believe that developing strong project management skills is a big advantage for product managers â€“ at the least your product will get to market faster, and it could make the difference between getting your product shipped at all. –Marty Cagan, “Ebay’s Secret Weapon”
